mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence to Capt. C. M. Stigleman from Joseph Epperly
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, January 21, 1862, to Capt. C. M. Stigleman at Union Mills, Va from Joseph Epperly at Floyd CoHo, Va and from B. Hylton at same place. Note: One letter on one side sheet by Mr. Epperly and another letter on the opposite side of same sheet by Mr. Hylton. Subject by Mr. Epperly: the body of his deceased son Tazwell B. Epperly returned to his home in Floyd County. Subject by Mr. Hylton: Return of Mr. Epperly’s son’s body and arrangements for that. 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
